name: vscode-password-generator
description: Generates passwords directly into the current editor window

vscode-password-generator.length.description: The length of password to generate

vscode-password-generator.includeUpperca.description: Include numbers in the generated password

vscode-password-generator.includeLowerca.description: Include numbers in the generated password

vscode-password-generator.includeNumbers.description: Include numbers in the generated password

vscode-password-generator.includeSymbols.description: Include symbols in the generated password

vscode-password-generator.symbolCharacte.description: A set of symbols to select from when for a generated password

vscode-password-generator.excludeCharact.description: A set of characters to exclude from the generated password

vscode-password-generator.excludeSimilar.description: Exclude similar looking characters (e.g. 0oO, 1lI) from the generated password

vscode-password-generator.strict.description: At least one of each included character type in the generated password

scripts.compile-web: npm run check-types && npm run lint && node esbuild.js
scripts.package-web: npm run check-types && npm run lint && node esbuild.js --production
